definition: to make an issue of sth/to fuss/to make a song and dance
some deeper meaning in this/more to it than meets the eye/there's sth behind all this

sentences.english: Show all articles on this topic.
sentences.chinese: 顯示所有關於這個主題的文章。

sentences.english: This article mainly introduces an improved system of mate-grinding servo valve.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了經這改進的伺服閥氣動配磨系統。

sentences.english: The whole wardrobe door on the door, then the train made a beautiful articles.
sentences.chinese: 有門的整體衣櫃，則在趟門上做起了美麗文章。

sentences.english: They define an "excellent paper" as one that is highly cited by other researchers.
sentences.chinese: 他們把“優秀論文”定義爲引用量高的文章。

sentences.english: The research progress of osteogenetic effects of OGP is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章對OGP促成骨作用的研究進展進行綜述。

sentences.english: The article conducts the research using method of the quota statistics and qualitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 文章運用定量統計和定性分析的方法進行研究。

sentences.english: He thoroughly takes the German national charater apart in the essay.
sentences.chinese: 他在這篇文章裏透徹地剖析了德意志民族性格。

sentences.english: Listen to the tape and find out the main idea of this article and how it is organized.
sentences.chinese: 通過聽錄音磁帶，來幫助學生對文章的結構有所瞭解。

sentences.english: The early failure phenomena of flyback transformer was discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章就回掃變壓器的早期失效現象進行了探討。

sentences.english: Auto-save of the article in a draft status.
sentences.chinese: 自動保存在草稿狀態的文章。

sentences.english: This article takes the Longhui Dialect as the example, inspecting its certain dialect word meaning.
sentences.chinese: 文章以隆回方言爲例，考察其若干方言詞義。

sentences.english: The adaptability of ground-cover Chrysanthemum group in Hainan is studied.
sentences.chinese: 文章報道了地被菊在海南引種的適應性情況。

sentences.english: Remuneration will be give to the writers within one month after the article is officially published.
sentences.chinese: 文章稿酬在稿件正式發佈後一個月內發放。

sentences.english: A laser land leveling technology is application in the harvester in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章是關於激光測平技術在收鹽機應用的方案設計。

sentences.english: The article also explains how to override the default file creation location.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章也說明了如何覆蓋默認的文件創建位置。

sentences.english: You should include some examples in the text.
sentences.chinese: 你應該在文章中舉一些例子。

definition: tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
blog article/to write a blog article (netspeak)
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
